reviewText: Someone steals a gift of valuable pearls at a wedding, and a guest jealously wants his fiancee to elope with him because another guest is her former boyfriendas well as the boyfriend of many of the other female wedding guests. This comedy turns into a farce when all the principals turn up at the honeymoon hotel and in, out, and through the bridal suite. This film is a weak farce with poor acting, a juvenile storyline, and forced attempts at humor. Dont waste your time with this one.
